Title: Krypton Palette Selectors
Description: A small C# control library that allows for simplified palette selection and management.  It makes use of and relies on Component Factory's excellent Krypton Toolkit.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A small C# control library that allows for simplified palette selection and management. It makes use of and relies on Component Factory's excellent Krypton Toolkit.

About Krypton Toolkit
Krypton Toolkit is a set of free windows forms controls developed by Component Factory.

See the documentation page for more information.
